description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Spinach & Tomato Wrap + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken, Spinach & Tomato Wrap + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 40g light tasty cheese slice, cut into strips

recipeInstructions.text: To make chicken wrap, combine chicken with yoghurt and semi-dried tomatoes in a bowl. Place chicken mixture and spinach in centre of wrap, then roll to enclose filling.

To make kiwifruit & coconut muffins, preheat oven to 200oC/180oC fan-forced. Line 6 holes of a 1/2-cup-capacity muffin pan with paper cases. Place flour, coconut and sugar in a large bowl. Finely chop 2 of the kiwi fruit and add to flour mixture. Whisk egg, oil and milk in a small jug. Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients. Stir until just combined. Divide among prepared muffin holes. Slice remaining kiwi fruit into 6 rounds. Top batter with kiwi fruit slices. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Cool for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Place one muffin in the lunch box and store remaining muffins in an airtight container in the fridge. Makes 6.
Snack 2: Serve celery sticks topped with cherry tomatoes and with hummus on the side.
